But i want to know first how to display web page from=
 arc file using heritrix, if that fails than i will use some other modules =
or jars...

Its dont need to be something fency, its just prototype project=
 for harvesting with heritrix.
Im still stuck on reading files from arc and=
 display the same files like. html, css ...

itrix jars from webapp lib into jdk/ext/lib because tomcat first load jars =
from ext.
Now i got another problem, crawler start and finishes almost in t=
he same time, crawl.log is not empty but crawl status is notCrawled.

Any i=
deas ?

Yes, Heritrix comes with its own (patched) HTTPClient =
implementation.
Is there a way to override tomcats httpclient in this case,=
 or should i run heritrix on another server to avoid conflict?
When i put p=
atched httpClient in tomcat common lib dir i get DNS error, when its in web=
app lib dir i get nosuchmethoderror(setCookieMap).

rix comes with its own (patched) HTTPClient implementation as far as I reme=
mber. So running inside a tomcat you might have conflicting libs ?

best
